transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Customer: Hello?

Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji, a goyal ji se baat ho rahi hai meri from umang traders?
Customer: Haan kahiye.
Executive: Haan actually sir koi baat nahi aap bahut chote ho chalo ya hum baad me le lenge. AC wali
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan namah bataiye.
Executive: Haan actually sir ek zaruri baat karni thi aapse main business manager baat kar raha hu sir Vivek Mishra from IndiaMART.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Haan main dekh raha hu sir aapki ye jo services abhi aap recently onboard hue hai sir IndiaMART pe.
Executive: To ye jo services aapki chal rahi hai sir with IndiaMART ye aap hi handle karte hai sir ya koi aur karta hai aapke alawa?
Customer: Main hi karta hu.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Executive: To abhi main dekh raha hu sir hardly aapko I think two weeks hue hai onboard hue aur aapne ek refund ka request dala hai sir.
Executive: To may I know sir kya challenge aa raha hai?
Customer: Sir challenge ye aa raha hai jaise ki maine koi bhi customer ko mature kara XYZ koi bhi.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Theek hai ab maine jaise ki ab wohi banda mujhse baat keh raha hai ki bhaiya main payment nahi karunga.
Customer: Theek hai aap mujhe pehle maal bhej do.
Customer: Fir main aapko payment karunga.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Theek hai to maine jo mera woh hai manager.
Customer: Jo mera staff hai jo aapne mujhe appoint kara hai.
Customer: Maine usko bola ki bhai ye baat main aisi aisi baat keh raha hai mujhse.
Customer: Ki bhai pehle payment de jabki meri aur IndiaMART ki ye baat hui thi ki advance payment pe kaam hoga.
Executive: Kya baat hui thi?
Customer: Advance payment pe kaam hoga.
Executive: A advance payment pe kaam hoga.
Customer: Haan matlab woh party mujhe payment dalegi tab main usko maal bhejunga.
Customer: Ye baat hui thi meri.
Customer: Matlab ye cheez aapko kisne inform kiya tha sir? Sir meri jaise maine payment karaya tha us din maine video call pe baat hui thi to aapke jo waha ke manager the jo meri bandi thi woh thi jo meri sales girl thi wahi.
Customer: Manisha karke koi thi.
Customer: Theek hai aur Mansi Dubey Mansi Dubey sorry.
Customer: Theek hai woh thi sath mein aur usme usi ne jo waha ka branch ka manager tha usko connect kara tha.
Customer: Theek hai aur jo ek aur banda tha beech mein Rohit Dubey Rohit Dubey Akbar Mehndi.
Customer: Haan I don't remember the name but do the ek aapke senior manager the aur dusra banda tha to usme baat hui thi ki hamara advance payment pe kaam hoga.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Theek hai aur dusra maine pura platform samjha kara maine shuruwat bhi kari maine video call wale jo tags hote hai maine sare woh bhi liye aur ye sari cheeze lene ke baad jab maine uspe demand dali bhai mujhe apni moongfali bechni thi maine Mansi mam ko bhi yahi kaha tha ki mam pehle mujhe apni moongfali bechni hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Peanuts. Peanuts. Haan peanuts right. Hmm hmm.
Customer: Jab demand ho to aap dena theek hai to mere demand usme dhundhi kuch theek hai main bulk mein kaam karta hu sir.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Main retail mein kaam nahi karta kabhi.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. Customer: Theek hai mera main abhi I am just 24 and I had like own two factories.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. Customer: Theek hai mere paas moongfali ke daane ka main kaam hai baki ki cheezon ki jo ye mustard hai theek hai aapka corn hai paddy hai main iski sab trading karta hu ye sab cheez mein kaam karta hu.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. Customer: Aur main side by side apna moongfali ka kaam karta hu to mujhe apni moongfali bechni thi maine us bande ko kaha tha ki bhai mujhe apni moongfali bechni hai to lead mili hui to maine jab usse Mohammad Mohammad karke ek banda hai jo mera manager hai matlab jo mujhe batata hai ki jo billing billing karne ke liye aapne koi banda appoint kara hoga.
Customer: Usse meri baat hui Mohammad Sadab naam hai shayad.
Executive: Haan jo aapke account manager hai. Customer: Haan jo mere account manager hai maine usko bola maine bhai is bande se baat kar lo payment dalwa do aap main isko maal bhej dunga.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Customer: Hamari jo deal hui thi usko paddy chahiye tha. Hmm. Customer: Moongfali ka kaam tab bhi nahi hua maine bola ki shayad abhi lead weed milne mein dikkat aa jayegi ya koi baat ho jayegi maine chalo koi baat nahi paddy ka ho raha hai matlab kuch to business mil raha hai mere ko kuch bhi business nahi mila overall maine us bande ko baat kari to usne bola ki sir ye hamare terms and conditions mein nahi hai ki hum kisi bhi kisi bhi bande ko phone karke hum usse baat kar rahe hai payment payment ko leke woh sirf aap hi ko number show hoga hamari uske number bhi show nahi hoga.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Theek hai to maine usko bola maine bhai aap baat kar lo keh raha hai sir ye hum allowed hi nahi hai aap kaise baat kar le maine bola theek hai.
Customer: Maine bola fir bhai maine usme raise kar diya ki sir mere kisi use ka nahi hai kyunki maine jis use ke liye mere ko chahiye tha woh use ho hi nahi raha hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Customer: Main kyun usko leke aage aage badhunga main aapko bhi disturb karu main char logo ko aur disturb karu uske liye.
Customer: Ye baat thi.
Executive: Dekhiye jo product line hai na paddy seeds ho gaya ya even peanut ho gaya sir isme I can see achchi khasi by lead jo hai woh approve hoti hai IndiaMART pe matlab traffic jo hai woh bahut achcha hai yaha par overall agar main dekhu hamare paas kafi sare supplier hai jo isme deal kar rahe hai aur unka achcha chal raha hai sir yaha se business pehli cheez dusri cheez jo aapne bola sir ki obvious si baat hai sir hamara kaam hai aapko right set of buyers IndiaMART is a matchmaking platform hamara kaam hai aapko right set of buyer se milwana sir hai na uske baad ki jo journey hai ha ji aap aap batao pehle ha to uske baad ki jo journey hai woh aap handle karna de diya humne aapki listing
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to sell peanuts first.

- Customer wants advance payment for products.

- No business received through IndiaMART.

- Executive's team not allowed to contact buyers directly.



Resolution:

- Executive stated good traffic for peanuts on IndiaMART.

- IndiaMART is a matchmaking platform.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, payment, peanuts, business
